title: Debate on Noam Chomsky Letter to JNU VC | Why 5 Accused Not Arrested ? | Left & Right | HMTV
description:
Watch Left and Right with VK over debate on Prof Noam Chomsky letter to JNU Vice Chancellor Mamidala Jagadesh Kumar over JNU controversy, debate on why 5 Accused Students not arrested who are behaved and commented against India, with Political Leaders and Analysts.
